```{r}
normalize <- function(x) {
num <- x - min(x)
denom <- max(x) - min(x)
return (num/denom)
}
```
```{r}
acs_numericals2 <- data.frame(acs$FamilyIncome, acs$NumBedrooms, acs$NumChildren, acs$NumPeople, acs$NumRooms, acs$NumVehicles, acs$NumWorkers, acs$HouseCosts, acs$ElectricBill, acs$Insurance)
acs_norm2 <- as.data.frame(lapply(acs_numericals2[1:10], normalize))
acs_norm2$HighIncome2 <- c(acs$HighIncome)
```
```{r}
# Count rows
m2 <- nrow(acs_numericals2)

# Create index of random row nums for the validation set
val2 <- sample(1:m2, size = round(m2/3))

# Create the learning and validation sets
acsNorm_learn2 <- acs_norm2[-val2,]
acsNorm_valid2 <- acs_norm2[val2,]
